revised_title: Dynamical Problems and Differential Equations: A Concluding Part
tldr: This paper presents a continuation of a previous work on a class of differential equations and their applications in dynamical problems. The author focuses on the variation of elements in elliptic motion, the motion of a free simple pendulum, and transformations of differential equations using new variables. The results are applied to planetary theory, providing a comprehensive understanding of the motion of a planetary system.
